search.name: French white pages
search.description:
Get an address from a name in France
Usage:
wpfr name [/prenom] [/adresse] /localite|/departement
Switches:
/prenom - first name
/adresse - address
/localite - location or zip code
/departement - department or region
Example:
wpfr musée du louvre /localite:paris
